text: The purpose of this study was to determine the prevalence and genotype ( sequencing of the hexon gene after polymerase chain reaction [ PCR ] screening ) of HAdVs among children with SARI in different areas of China from 2007 to 2010 . HAdV infections are often associated with the co - infection of bacterial or viral agents [ 21 ] , frequently leading to severe clinical consequences in hospital patients . Thus , co - infection with other respiratory viruses of HAdV was also investigated .
